## Command line

 - R is used more and more
 - So also for executing R-scripts

## Typical usage

```R
#!/usr/bin/Rscript
my_model <- lm(data=iris, Sepal.Width ~ Sepal.Length)
print(coef(my_model))
```

## Typical usage
\tiny

```R
#!/usr/bin/Rscript

my_data <- iris
dep <- "Sepal.Width"
indep <- "Sepal.Length"

f <- as.formula(paste0(dep, " ~ ", indep))
my_model <- lm(data=my_data, f)
print(coef(my_model))
```
